description: A devastating combo of 5 rapid slashes, each building bleed stacks. Pure predatory violence.
A basic physical attack.
ULTIMATE: Transform into the apex predator. All attacks cause bleed, gain life steal, and execute threshold raised to 30% for 4 turns.
Deep wounds that cause severe bleeding. Deals bonus damage to bleeding targets.
Intercept all attacks targeting an ally this turn, taking the damage in their place.
Brace for incoming attacks, reducing damage taken this turn.
Sacrifice 20% of your current HP to fully heal an ally. The gift of life has a cost.
A killing blow aimed at weakened prey. Deals massive bonus damage to targets below 25% HP. Instant kill below 10%.
Touch an enemy's mind, inflicting terror that reduces their attack and may cause them to skip their turn.
Grant all allies increased defense for 3 turns. The wall protects everyone.
Enter a blood rage. Massively increases attack and speed but reduces defense. Each kill extends duration.
Massively increase your defense for 3 turns, becoming an immovable bulwark.
ULTIMATE: Become the final line of defense. Absorb ALL damage for the party for 3 turns while gaining massive regeneration.
Create a bond between yourself and all allies. Damage is shared equally among the linked. Lasts 3 turns.
Drain a small amount of life from an enemy, healing yourself for the damage dealt.
Flood the minds of all enemies with contradicting illusions. Confused enemies may attack their allies.
Drain life from ALL enemies, distributing the stolen vitality among all allies.
Create a small distraction that reduces an enemy's accuracy. They attack what isn't there.
Create 3 illusory copies of yourself. Each copy absorbs one attack before vanishing. Enemies cannot tell which is real.
Ultimate: All enemies cannot evade, take more damage, weaknesses revealed for 3 turns. Once per battle.
Consumes a buff from the target, transferring it to self.
Takes damage in place of an ally, absorbing their suffering.
Takes damage in place of an ally and heals self for a portion.
The Hollow unleashes its true nature - a berserker state where pain becomes power. Takes damage to massively boost offense.
Launches a glob of corrosive acid at the target.
Launches digestive fluids at the target, causing burning damage.
Ultimate: Massive single-target attack that ignores defense. Once per battle.
Absorbs a fallen body into the collective, gaining power.
Acts twice this turn, but attacks deal reduced damage.
Captures the essence of a defeated foe, storing power.
Removes one debuff from an ally with a gentle touch.
Teleports behind the target for a surprise attack.
Expands grotesquely, increasing HP but reducing Speed.
Passive: Deals bonus damage to bleeding targets.
A blindingly fast attack that grants evasion until next turn.
A fast, vicious bite with bone-crushing force. High critical rate.
Creates a protective barrier, reducing damage to an adjacent ally.
Digs underground, becoming untargetable until next attack.
Creates a defensive barrier of interlocking chains, greatly increasing defense for all allies.
Speaks all their names at once, inflicting Despair on all enemies.
Countless voices shriek in unison, shattering minds.
Devours a weakened target whole, instantly killing if HP is low.
The Hollow spins into a whirlwind of shadow, pulling enemies toward its core while draining their essence.
Finds meaning in protecting an ally, greatly boosting defenses.
Phase 3: A desperate, powerful but erratic attack as the villagers fight back.
Charges at the weakest target with reckless abandon.
Consume a fallen ally to restore HP. Desperate but effective.
Warps space around enemies, reducing their accuracy.
Ultimate: Full party heal, cleanse all debuffs, and revive fallen allies. Once per battle.
Stares into the target's soul, lowering their defense and possibly causing confusion.
The Hollow channels the power of pure terror, wreathing itself in crimson energy that enhances all attacks.
Engulfs the target in overwhelming sorrow, dealing massive damage.
Drains life force from the target, healing the Hollow.
The vessel's body persists even when the soul departs.
Grows stronger with each fallen ally, channeling shared pain.
A brutal finishing move that deals massive damage.
Releases stored spiritual energy in a devastating blast.
After killing a target, immediately attack again.
A chaotic flailing of limbs, hitting random targets multiple times.
The Congregation enters an enraged state when near death.
At 10% HP: Must be interrupted or the Congregation heals 25%.
Sees incoming attacks, granting party-wide evasion buff.
Enters a blood frenzy, sacrificing HP for devastating damage.
Shows the target their worst memory, with a chance to inflict Fear.
A vicious bite that tears flesh, causing bleeding.
Gains defense when any creature dies nearby. Passive trigger.
Releases a wave of restorative energy, healing all allies.
Phase 3: The villagers sabotage from within, causing random debuffs to the Congregation.
Attacks then swaps to the back row, avoiding counterattacks.
A mournful cry that inflicts deep sorrow on all enemies.
Reinforces the vessel, increasing defensive capabilities.
If enemy is casting, instantly attack and cancel their ability.
Phase 2: Attempts to grab and devour a target. Must be interrupted or massive damage.
Wraps chains around the target, reducing their speed and chance to act.
Hardens body to increase defense significantly for 3 turns.
Drains life from the target, healing the user for a portion of damage dealt.
Wraps around the target's legs, immobilizing them.
Revives a fallen ally with 25% of their maximum HP. Once per battle.
Attack with increased ferocity when the trainer is wounded.
All eyes focus on target, making them take increased damage.
Countless eyes scan the battlefield, improving all allies' accuracy.
The writhing mass slams into the target with terrible weight.
Bathes all allies in merciful radiance, healing the entire party.
Copies the defensive capabilities of an observed target.
A wail of grief that drains the will to fight from all enemies.
Splits off pieces of itself, spawning Mawling servants.
Bathes all allies in healing light, restoring HP to the party.
The sheer mass of the Congregation crushes the will to fight.
Coordinated attack with bonus damage if other Mawlings are present.
Gains attack power when allies are alive.
Shifts between dimensions, becoming briefly intangible.
Leaps at the target with tremendous force.
Marks a target as prey, increasing all damage dealt to them.
Deals bonus damage to targets below 50% HP.
Ultimate: 6 rapid attacks on random enemies, each can crit. Once per battle.
A flurry of slashing bites that strike multiple times.
Rips through reality itself, dealing damage that ignores defenses.
Consumes a corpse on the battlefield to heal significantly.
Shares suffering with attackers, reflecting a portion of damage.
The collective flesh knits itself back together.
Expels consumed matter in a devastating area attack.
Tears into the target with savage claws.
Crushes the target with corroded chains, dealing damage and applying poison from the rust.
Creates a protective sanctuary, reducing damage to all allies for 2 turns.
Breaks apart and reforms, damaging nearby enemies.
Damage is distributed among all members of the collective.
Slams a massive chain-wrapped fist into the target, dealing heavy damage with a chance to stun.
The Hollow's claws tear through reality itself, leaving an X-shaped wound of crimson void energy that shreds armor.
Shares sight with an ally, significantly boosting their accuracy.
A gentle healing pulse that restores HP to a single ally.
Wraps around the target, draining life with cold tears.
Drains spiritual energy from the target.
A powerful single-target heal using light taken from consumed healers.
A lightning-fast attack that may paralyze the target.
Weeps burning tears that scald and demoralize the target.
A razor-sharp tendril whips out at blinding speed, striking with precision to exploit weak points.
Shadow tendrils erupt from the ground, sweeping across all enemies and dragging them into darkness.
A bone-chilling roar that strikes fear into all enemies.
Innocent laughter echoes, with a chance to Confuse all enemies.
Ancient knowledge grants defensive fortification.
Wraps around a target, dealing damage over time while healing self.
A massive blow channeling the village blacksmith's strength.
Passive: 30% base evasion chance against all attacks.
Releases a cloud of noxious gas that poisons all nearby.
The collective empowers all allies with shared purpose.
Chaotic energy fluctuates, randomly altering stats.
Sprays toxic venom at all enemies, poisoning them.
Takes damage in place of an ally, reducing incoming harm.
The Hollow channels dark energy through its chest core, unleashing a devastating beam of crimson void energy that pierces through enemies.
The Hollow compresses void energy into an unstable sphere that detonates on impact, dealing splash damage.
A touch of nothingness that silences magic users.
Taunts all enemies while boosting defense for 3 turns.
Forcibly relocates a target through dimensional space.
Shows visions of the village's last festival while healing itself.
An attack that always hits, guided by countless watching eyes.
Trap an enemy in their worst fears. They take damage each turn and cannot act while asleep. Breaking free leaves them terrified.
Average your HP percentage with an enemy's. If they're healthier, you drain them. If you're healthier, they drain you.
Pounce on the weakest enemy with savage precision. Guaranteed critical hit on targets below 50% HP.
Break an enemy's perception of reality completely. Deals massive mental damage and removes all buffs. They cannot distinguish friend from foe.
A savage slash that tears flesh, causing the target to bleed.
Slam your shield into the enemy, dealing damage with a chance to stun.
Drain life from an enemy and channel it to heal an ally for 150% of the damage dealt.
Force all enemies to target you for 2 turns. They cannot ignore your challenge.
ULTIMATE: Reveal what lies beyond the Veil to all enemies. Those who witness it may never recover. Massive damage with chance to instantly defeat weak-willed foes.
For 2 turns, you cannot be reduced below 1 HP. The shield wall holds.
ULTIMATE: Become a conduit for all life energy. For 4 turns, all damage dealt by allies heals the party, and fallen allies are revived at 50% HP.
